name: WPEC Bulk Category Pricing
author: Zao

sections.description: This plugin allows WP E-Commerce store admins to select certain categories as ‘bulk pricing’ categories, add a product threshold and discount to that category. On the front-end, when any combination of products from one of these categories is in the shopping cart, and has met or exceeded the specified threshold, the specified discount is applied to each product.
sections.installation:
1. Upload wpec_bulk_cat.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. Go to Product Categories and edit category meta as necessary.
sections.faq: None yet. Props to jn0101 for initial patches for multiple category support.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Fixes wpdb::prepare notices

1.0.1

  • Adds ability for multiple category assignment, also tiered category pricing (different bulk rates per category at different cart totals for said category)

1.0
